parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post mentions the PSD and PNL parties and their respective candidates (implicitly, through mentioning the mayor's party affiliation) in the context of local elections in Vârful Câmpului commune. While not explicitly naming candidates, the reference to party affiliation in relation to the performance of the mayors directly links the content to specific candidates who ran under those parties.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The hashtags (#voceabotosani #Botosani) further suggest an intention to reach a broad audience within and around Botoșani.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The core message of the post is a comparison of the performance of PSD and PNL mayors, implicitly suggesting that voters should consider this comparison when making their choices. The question "Cât de încrezători sunt locuitorii #Comuna_Vârful_Câmpului că au votat ce trebuie la alegerile din iunie 2024?" directly encourages reflection on past voting choices, implying a preference for one party over the other. This clearly aims to influence voting behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents information, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. The framing of the comparison between the two mayors is clearly biased, favoring one party over the other.  It's presented as an opinion piece rather than objective news reporting.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's presenting a comparison intended to sway public opinion towards a particular party. The rhetorical question at the end is a clear call to action, not a personal reflection.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1118428286643213</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, a paid advertisement by Vocea Botoșani, compares the performance of PSD and PNL mayors in Vârful Câmpului commune.  While not explicitly endorsing a candidate, the implicit comparison and the concluding rhetorical question strongly suggest a preference for one party over the other. This constitutes electoral propaganda as it aims to influence voters' choices in past elections (June 2024) and potentially future ones. The targeting of specific localities in Botoșani County further strengthens this conclusion.  The post lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting, instead presenting a biased comparison.  The paid nature of the post on a public platform ensures wide dissemination, fulfilling the criteria of addressing the public.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Maria Huțu (PSD)</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Dumitru-Ovidiu Domunco (PNL)</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Vocea Botoșani</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Societatea Vocea Botoșani, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID 1118428286643213) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care face o comparație tendențioasă între performanța primarilor PSD și PNL din comuna Vârful Câmpului, implicit influențând votul alegătorilor.  Postarea, prin formularea sa ("Cât de încrezători sunt locuitorii #Comuna_Vârful_Câmpului că au votat ce trebuie la alegerile din iunie 2024?")  și prin compararea implicită a rezultatelor celor doi primari, are un efect electoral clar, vizând influențarea opiniei publice în favoarea PNL și în defavoarea PSD.  Această postare, deși nu numește explicit candidații, se încadrează în definiția materialului de propagandă electorală, având în vedere că se referă direct la partide politice participante la alegeri, este utilizată după încheierea perioadei de campanie, se adresează publicului larg și are un obiectiv electoral evident.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
